summary: 1990  was a common year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: A Tenured Professor  is a satirical novel by Canadian/American economist and Professor Emeritus at Harvard, John Kenneth Galbraith, about a liberal university teacher who sets out to change American society by making money and then using it for the public good. Set at Harvard mainly during the Reagan administration, the plot and all the characters that appear in the story are entirely fictitious.
title: A Tenured Professor
